snippet: A suicide car bomber detonated his explosives near a convoy of elite Somali troops known as the Alpha Group in the capital, Mogadishu, killing at least four people, a Somali police officer said Sunday.
abstract: Somali police say suicide car bomber detonated explosives near a convoy of elite Somali troops in capital Mogadishu, killing at least four people; Shabab militant group claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: A suicide car bomber detonated his explosives near a convoy of elite Somali troops known as the Alpha Group in the capital, Mogadishu, killing at least four people, a Somali police officer said Sunday.

headline.main: Somalia: Suicide Bomber Attacks Troops in Capital
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Suicide Bomber Attacks Troops in Capital
